attributes.action: disregard the petition by Shahid Anwar calling for the banning of the B.N.P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst sympathising with the view held by Shahid Anwar, nevertheless I defend the right, in this democratic country of ours, for the B.N.P. to express their views. I leave the knowledgeable British public to make up their own minds in this respect as they have always done using common sense at election time.
